Title: The Last Plantation
Writer: Marcos Farias, Eglê Malheiros, Salim Miguel, José Lins do Rego (novel)
Actors: Joffre Soares, Othon Bastos, Rafael de Carvalho, Rodolfo Arena
Plot: In 1910, in the State of Paraíba, Brazil, a man is expelled from his own land by the ruthless colonel who owns the sugar mill. He asks some outlaws to help him retrieve his land.
